definition: to apply (paint etc)/to smear/to daub/to blot out/to scribble/to scrawl/(literary) mud/street
lower form of animal life, including insects, insect larvae, worms and similar creatures/CL:條|条[tiao2],隻|只[zhi1]/(fig.) person with a particular undesirable characteristic

sentences.english: I always said she was an awful fool.
sentences.chinese: 我一直就说她是十足的糊涂虫。

sentences.english: He was an idiot to lose his glasses.
sentences.chinese: 他是个糊涂虫把自己的眼镜也丢了。

sentences.english: Dopey has big ears and Grumpy has a grumpy face.
sentences.chinese: 糊涂虫长着大耳朵，爱生气有一张愤怒的脸。

sentences.english: The scatterbrain me might just forget to tell her if I leave it till tomorrow.
sentences.chinese: 要等到明天，那我这糊涂虫会忘记的。

definition: unable to accomplish anything but liable to spoil everything (idiom)/unable to do anything right/never make, but always mar
pinyin: cheng2 shi4 bu4 zu2 , bai4 shi4 you3 yu2

definition: not understanding things (idiom); devoid of sense
unable to distinguish right and wrong (idiom)
without learning or skills (idiom); ignorant and incompetent
wine sack, food bag (idiom); useless person, only fit for guzzling and boozing
